title: Melanzane alla parmigiana (Aubergine and Parmesan bake)
ingredients: ['1 aubergine, cut into 1cm slices', '1 1/2 tablespoons salt', '8 tablespoons olive oil', '225g ricotta cheese', '170g grated mozzarella cheese', '40g grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg, beaten', '20g chopped fresh basil', '800g tomato pasta sauce']
